goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 224 KB)
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office for Disaster Reduction (UNISDR)
title: Untitled
computation_definitions: Age Specific fertility rates are the ratio between the numbers of live births born from mothers of specific age to 1000 women of the same age.
computation_calculations: Number of live births born from mothers of specific age/estimated number of women age specific age * 1000
comments_limitations: Age Specific fertility rates per 1,000 inhabitants for the period 1996-2004 are calculated based on estimates of the present population, and for the period 2005-2022 they are calculated in relation to the estimated number of inhabitants based on the data of the 2013 Census.
